tools.title: XSS Scanner
tools.description: XSS Scanner detects and prevents cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities by identifying unsafe user inputs that could be exploited for attacks.

tools.title: SQL Injection Scanner
tools.description: SQL Injection Scanner helps detect and prevent SQL injection attacks by identifying unsafe user inputs that could be used to manipulate database queries.

tools.title: Search Engine Scanner
tools.description: Search Engine Scanner identifies security risks and sensitive data exposure in search engine results, helping protect your online presence

tools.title: WAF Detector
tools.description: WAF Detector analyzes web traffic to identify active Web Application Firewalls, helping assess security measures and potential bypass techniques

tools.title: Subdomain Reconnaissance
tools.description: Subdomain Recon identifies hidden subdomains of a target domain, helping uncover attack surfaces and potential security risks

tools.title: Hidden Files / Dir Reconnaissance
tools.description: Hidden Files/Directory Reconnaissance identifies unlisted files and directories on a web server, helping uncover potential security risks and sensitive data exposure.

tools.title: WaybackÂ machine
tools.description: Wayback Machine archives website snapshots over time, helping retrieve deleted content, track changes, and uncover hidden data for research and security analysis.
